basics.name: Pavlo Golub
basics.label: Senior Developer and PostgreSQL Consultant
basics.summary: Senior Developer and PostgreSQL Consultant with over 20 years of professional experience specializing in PostgreSQL database optimization, high-performance backend development, and robust, open-source software solutions. Official PostgreSQL Contributor, co-founder of PostgreSQL Ukraine, and Google Summer of Code PostgreSQL Organization Administrator, actively contributing to the PostgreSQL community. Adept at architecting scalable systems, enhancing database reliability, and mentoring technical teams.

work.name: Cybertec PostgreSQL International
work.summary: Provide expert consulting services on PostgreSQL optimization, clustering, and performance tuning. Mentor teams, deliver training, and develop open-source tools.
highlights: Developed pgwatch, a non-invasive PostgreSQL monitoring solution with Grafana integration.
Created pg_timetable, an advanced PostgreSQL job scheduler.
Ported Patroni to Windows.
Developed vip-manager for PostgreSQL high availability.

work.name: MicroOLAP Technologies
work.summary: Led development of flagship database tools. Managed full product lifecycle and customer support.
highlights: Directed development of MicroOLAP Database Designer for PostgreSQL.
Created and maintained PostgresDAC components.
Built PaGoDump & PaGoRestore GUI tools for PostgreSQL backup and restore.

certificates.name: Google Summer of Code PostgreSQL Organization Administrator

projects.name: pgwatch
projects.description: Non-invasive PostgreSQL monitoring tool with Grafana dashboards and multi-environment support.
highlights: No superuser rights or extensions required.
Supports AWS RDS, PgBouncer, Pgpool2, and Patroni.
Metrics stored in PostgreSQL, TimescaleDB, or Prometheus.

projects.name: pg_timetable
projects.description: Advanced PostgreSQL job scheduler with support for SQL commands and system operations.
highlights: Fully database-driven design.
Superior to cron for PostgreSQL-related workflows.
Supports parallel and conditional job chains.

projects.name: Patroni for Windows
projects.description: Port of the high-availability PostgreSQL tool Patroni to Windows.
highlights: Adapted core functionality to support Windows environments.
Enabled high-availability clusters on Windows-based infrastructure.

projects.name: vip-manager
projects.description: Cross-platform VIP manager for PostgreSQL HA setups.
highlights: Automates virtual IP management for failover.
Improves availability and recovery times in HA clusters.

projects.name: MicroOLAP Database Designer for PostgreSQL
projects.description: Visual tool for designing and managing PostgreSQL database schemas.
highlights: Support for reverse engineering.
Graphical modeling of tables, views, and relationships.

projects.name: PostgresDAC
projects.description: Delphi/C++ Builder components for direct access to PostgreSQL databases.
highlights: Streamlined integration with Delphi-based applications.
Supported a wide range of PostgreSQL versions.

projects.name: PaGoDump & PaGoRestore
projects.description: Portable GUI tools for PostgreSQL backup and restore.
highlights: Full support for pg_dump/pg_restore options.
Portable and Unicode-enabled Windows applications.
